OR ? = 0 ) AND ( c.groupId = ? OR ? = 0 ) [$WHEREPARENTCOURSE$] [$WHERETITLEDESCRIPTIONCATEGORIESTAGSAND$] [$WHERETITLEDESCRIPTIONCATEGORIESTAGSOR$] [$WHERERESOURCEPERMISSION$]
INNER JOIN assetentry ae ON ae.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMECOURSEID$] AND ae.classPK = c.courseId
INNER JOIN assetentries_assetcategories aac[$i$] ON aac[$i$].entryId = ae.entryId
INNER JOIN assetentries_assettags aat[$i$] ON aat[$i$].entryId = ae.entryId
INNER JOIN layoutset l ON l.groupId = c.groupCreatedId AND l.layoutSetPrototypeUuid IN ([$TEMPLATES$])

INNER JOIN resourcepermission rp ON rp.name = 'com.liferay.lms.model.Course' AND rp.companyId = [$COMPANYID$] AND ((primKey = c.courseId AND scope = 4) OR (primKey = [$COMPANYID$] AND scope = 1)) AND (actionIds & [$ACTIONPUBLISH$] || actionIds & [$ACTIONCOURSEEDITOR$] || actionIds & [$ACTIONASSIGN_MEMBERS$] || actionIds & [$ACTIONDELETE$] || actionIds & [$ACTIONPERMISSION$] || actionIds & [$ACTIONUPDATE$]) LEFT JOIN users_roles ur ON rp.roleId = ur.roleId AND ur.roleId AND ur.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ug ON ug.groupId = c.groupCreatedId AND ug.roleId = rp.roleId AND ug.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN groups_roles gr ON gr.roleId = rp.roleId LEFT JOIN group_ g ON gr.groupId = g.groupId LEFT JOIN users_usergroups uug ON uug.userGroupId = g.classPK AND g.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDUSERGROUP$] AND uug.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN users_orgs uo ON uo.organizationId = g.classPK AND g.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDORGANIZATION$] AND uo.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN users_groups ug2 ON ug2.groupId = g.classPK AND g.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDGROUP$] AND ug2.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ugrC ON ugrC.groupId = c.groupCreatedId AND ugrC.userId = [$USERID$] AND ugrC.roleId IN ([$ROLEEDITOR$],[$ROLETEACHER$])

INNER JOIN resourcepermission rp ON rp.name = 'com.liferay.lms.model.Course' AND rp.companyId = [$COMPANYID$] AND ((primKey = c.courseId AND scope = 4) OR (primKey = [$COMPANYID$] AND scope = 1)) AND (actionIds & [$ACTIONVIEW$] ) LEFT JOIN users_roles ur ON rp.roleId = ur.roleId AND ur.roleId AND ur.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ug ON ug.groupId = c.groupId AND ug.roleId = rp.roleId AND ug.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN groups_roles gr ON gr.roleId = rp.roleId LEFT JOIN group_ g ON gr.groupId = g.groupId LEFT JOIN users_usergroups uug ON uug.userGroupId AND g.classPK AND g.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDUSERGROUP$] AND uug.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN users_orgs uo ON uo.organizationId = g.classPK AND g.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDORGANIZATION$] AND uo.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN users_groups ug2 ON ug2.groupId = g.classPK AND g.classNameId = [$CLASSNAMEIDGROUP$] AND ug2.userId = [$USERID$] LEFT JOIN users_groups ugroup ON ugroup.groupId = c.groupId AND ugroup.userId = [$USERID$]
AND ( ur.userId IS NOT NULL OR ug.userId IS NOT NULL OR uug.userGroupId IS NOT NULL OR uo.userId IS NOT NULL OR ug2.userId IS NOT NULL OR ugrC.userId IS NOT NULL )

AND ( ur.userId IS NOT NULL OR ug.userId IS NOT NULL OR uug.userGroupId IS NOT NULL OR uo.userId IS NOT NULL OR ug2.userId IS NOT NULL OR (rp.roleId = [$ROLEMEMBER$] AND ugroup.userId IS NOT NULL) OR rp.roleId = [$ROLEGUEST$] )

AND ( ('[$FREETEXT$]' = '' OR IF (ExtractValue(c.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )='', ExtractValue(c.title, '//root[@default-locale]//Title'), ExtractValue(c.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )) LIKE '[$FREETEXT$]' OR IF (ExtractValue(c.description, '//Description[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )='', ExtractValue(c.description, '//root[@default-locale]//Description' ), ExtractValue(c.description, '//Description[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )) LIKE '[$FREETEXT$]') AND ([$STATUS$] = -1 OR [$STATUS$] = c.closed) [$WHEREANDASSETCATEGORY$] [$WHEREANDASSETTAG$] )

AND ( (IF (ExtractValue(c.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )='', ExtractValue(c.title, '//root[@default-locale]//Title' ), ExtractValue(c.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )) LIKE '[$FREETEXT$]' OR IF (ExtractValue(c.description, '//Description[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )='', ExtractValue(c.description, '//root[@default-locale]//Description' ), ExtractValue(c.description, '//Description[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]' )) LIKE '[$FREETEXT$]' OR [$STATUS$] = c.closed [$WHEREORASSETCATEGORY$] [$WHEREORASSETTAG$]) )
AND aac[$i$].categoryId = ([$CATEGORYIDS$])
AND aat[$i$].tagId = ([$TAGIDS$])
AND aat[$i$].tagId IN ([$TAGIDS$])
OR aac0.categoryId IN ([$CATEGORYIDS$])
OR aat0.tagId IN ([$TAGIDS$])
AND ae.visible = 1

SELECT DISTINCT u.* FROM lms_course co INNER JOIN users_groups ug ON co.groupCreatedId = ug.groupId INNER JOIN user_ u ON u.userId = ug.userId LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ur ON ug.userId = ur.userId AND ur.groupId = ug.groupId AND ur.roleId= ? LEFT JOIN usergrouprole urE ON ug.userId = urE.userId AND urE.groupId = ug.groupId AND urE.roleId = ? WHERE ur.userId IS NULL AND urE.userId IS NULL AND co.courseId = ? AND u.status = ? AND ( [$WHEREFIRSTNAME$] [$WHERELASTNAME$] [$WHERESCREENNAME$] [$WHEREEMAILADDRESS$] [$DEFAULT$]
) ORDER BY [$ORDERBY$]

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT u.userId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM lms_course co INNER JOIN users_groups ug ON co.groupCreatedId = ug.groupId INNER JOIN user_ u ON u.userId = ug.userId LEFT JOIN usergrouprole ur ON ug.userId = ur.userId AND ur.groupId = ug.groupId AND ur.roleId= ? LEFT JOIN usergrouprole urE ON ug.userId = urE.userId AND urE.groupId = ug.groupId AND urE.roleId = ? WHERE ur.userId IS NULL AND urE.userId IS NULL AND co.courseId = ? AND (u.status = ? OR ? = ?) AND ( [$WHEREFIRSTNAME$] [$WHERELASTNAME$] [$WHERESCREENNAME$] [$WHEREEMAILADDRESS$] [$DEFAULT$] )
(u.firstName LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$]
(u.lastName LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$]
(u.screenName LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$]
(u.emailAddress LIKE ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$]
AND (c.parentCourseId = 0 OR c.parentCourseId IS NULL)
AND (c.parentCourseId = ?)

SELECT IF(COUNT(1) > 0,true,false) AS hasActWithTries FROM ( SELECT IF(lar.latId IS NOT NULL, COUNT(1), 0) AS numTriesUser, la.actId, la.tries FROM lms_course c INNER JOIN lms_learningactivity la ON c.groupCreatedId = la.groupId LEFT JOIN lms_learningactivitytry lar ON la.actId = lar.actId AND lar.userId = ? WHERE c.courseId = ? GROUP BY la.actId ) AS TABLA WHERE tries = 0 OR numTriesUser < tries

SELECT c.courseId, u.userId, IF(EXTRACTVALUE(c.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]') != '', EXTRACTVALUE(c.title, '//Title[@language-id=\"[$LANGUAGE$]\"]'), IF(EXTRACTVALUE(c.title, '//root[@default-locale]//Title') != '', EXTRACTVALUE(c.title, '//root[@default-locale]//Title'), c.title )) AS courseTitle, CASE WHEN r.crId IS NULL THEN '0' WHEN r.passedDate IS NULL THEN '1' WHEN r.passedDate IS NOT NULL AND r.passed = 0 THEN '2' WHEN r.passed = 1 AND r.passedDate IS NOT NULL THEN '3' ELSE '0' END AS statusUser, CASE WHEN r.crId IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE r.result END AS result, c.icon, c.groupCreatedId, c.friendlyURL FROM lms_course c INNER JOIN users_groups u ON c.groupCreatedId = u.groupId AND u.userId = ? LEFT OUTER JOIN lms_courseresult r ON c.courseId = r.courseId AND r.userId = ? WHERE c.closed = 0 AND (SELECT MAX(mo.endDate) FROM lms_module mo WHERE mo.groupId = c.groupCreatedId) > '[$DATENOW$]' AND (r.crId IS NULL OR r.allowFinishDate IS NULL OR r.allowFinishDate > '[$DATENOW$]') AND c.groupId = ? GROUP By c.courseId

SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM lms_course c INNER JOIN users_groups u ON c.groupCreatedId = u.groupId AND u.userId = ? LEFT OUTER JOIN lms_courseresult r ON c.courseId = r.courseId AND r.userId = ? WHERE c.closed = 0 AND (SELECT MAX(mo.endDate) FROM lms_module mo WHERE mo.groupId = c.groupCreatedId) > '[$DATENOW$]' AND (r.crId IS NULL OR r.allowFinishDate IS NULL OR r.allowFinishDate > '[$DATENOW$]') AND c.groupId = ? GROUP By c.courseId
SELECT c.* FROM lms_course c INNER JOIN users_groups u ON c.groupCreatedId = u.groupId AND u.userId = ? WHERE c.closed = 0 GROUP By c.courseId LIMIT [$START$], [$END$]
SELECT c.* FROM lms_course c INNER JOIN group_ g ON c.groupCreatedId = g.groupId WHERE c.parentCourseId = ? AND c.closed = 0 AND (g.type_ = ? OR g.type_ = ?) LIMIT [$START$], [$END$]
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.courseId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM lms_course c INNER JOIN group_ g ON c.groupCreatedId = g.groupId WHERE c.parentCourseId = ? AND c.closed = 0 AND (g.type_ = ? OR g.type_ = ?)
